meanings.definition: The state or quality of moving or pointing towards a lower position.
meanings.sent1: The downwardness of the roller coaster made my stomach drop.
meanings.sent2: The downwardness of the stairs made it difficult for the elderly woman to climb up.
meanings.sent3: The downwardness of the elevator was so fast, it felt like a free fall!
meanings.sent4: The downwardness of the waterfall was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The downwardness of the airplane during takeoff was thrilling.

meanings.definition: The act of descending or moving in a downward direction.
meanings.sent1: The hiker felt the downwardness of the trail as he descended the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The downwardness of the ski slope made it exhilarating for the skiers.
meanings.sent3: The downwardness of the slide at the playground was a favorite for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The downwardness of the sun as it set painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent5: The downwardness of the river's flow carried the leaves downstream.
